text: Osvaldo Genazzani was an Italian actor who appeared in more than forty films. He appeared alongside Amedeo Nazzari in the 1948 Spanish comedy Unexpected Conflict.Lancia p.104 ==Selected filmography== * The Last Days of Pompeii (1926) * Boccaccio (1940) * Saint John, the Beheaded (1940) * Love Story (1942) * Measure for Measure (1943) * Two Hearts (1943) * Unexpected Conflict (1948) * Mare Nostrum (1948) * The Butterfly That Flew Over the Sea (1948) * That Luzmela Girl (1949) * In a Corner of Spain (1949) * Child of the Night (1950) * 4 Dollars of Revenge (1966) * Clint the Stranger (1967) * The Boldest Job in the West (1969) * Watch Out Gringo! Sabata Will Return (1972) as Mormon leader == References == == Bibliography == * Lancia, Enrico. Amedeo Nazzari. Gremese Editore, 1983. == External links == * Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:Italian male film actors Category:20th-century Italian male actors
title: Osvaldo Genazzani
